author: steve marshall
comment: Great app is there going to be a update for the use of android wear 2.0 compalations

author: B Duclion
comment: Best calendar for android wear. Hands down.

author: Antti Korpinen
comment: Works like a charm but events must be dictated in by voice. Please add a keypad option to do this. Would then rate 5/5. Running on Huawei watch.
title: Please add option to type in events

author: Jupiter Bright
comment: please add support to type with flickkey keyboard

author: Glenn Stockwell
comment: This app looks great and I was particularly excited about the keypad for adding new events. The problem is that it turns on after I receive any notifications to my LG G Watch R, regardless of what kind of  notification I get. It also just turns on for no reason and shines at full brightness... It makes the app almost unusable if it keeps turning on by itself.
title: Turns on automatically after notifications

author: Peter G.
comment: I like the functions and the app itself, but the font just kills it for me, hence only 3 stars. Please add the ability to switch to a different font, a lot of people already requested it.

author: Carl Knox
comment: Here again when I am in a situation at work where it is frowned upon to pull out my smart phone I can at a quick glance check my calendar. Works great on an lg g watch.
title: Most of all

author: Roman Hnatiuk
comment: So far looks good. Likely the best calendar for Wear. Week numbers are unreadable on Moto 360, though - way too small and weird font.
title: Excellent!

author: John Cesta
comment: It's just like my phone calendar. Beautiful and very functional.
title: Don't know how they did this....

author: Alex Kam
comment: This app is awesome, not expensive, worth to buy it. I tried several calender app for my moto 360, but only this one is satisfied me.
title: Worth to buy

author: Way A
comment: Yup, this one is a keeper!!
title: For Zen watch

author: Nrseife S
comment: Nice app - and the information/calendar is cached and available even when not connected to a phone.. However, for my eyes the font size is too small. Please implement the option of a different (larger) font size. Thanks!
title: font sizes

author: Wayne Mason
comment: This is the best calendar for Android Wear I have found. Does so much, and does it very well on such a small screen. It also very responsive without lag.
title: Deserves 5 stars

author: Chris Reaney
comment: It's by far the best on the market, works like a dream on the G Watch R.
title: So slick love this calendar!

author: Lee Weaver
comment: Best calender available for wear. But would like to see the keyboard from the "flickkey" app intergrated. Also would like a letter above date columns to indicate day of week.

author: todd adolph
comment: Please fix day of week when setting appointment...December 28th is not  Wednesday but us Sunday...day setting is off...will rate 5 when fixed...thanks
title: Well almost there

author: Chris Ruiz
comment: Very nice on LG G Watch

author: Γιάννης Μανουσάκης
comment: Remarkable effort! Keep the good work! Need some improvements but as I see you update almost daily with new features!
title: Very good

author: Dennis Cowper
comment: Have installed and uninstalled this app three times for my moto 360 every time I installed the app it reduced battery life by 75% to 80%. The app imposes a constant and surprisingly visible drain. You can actually watch as the battery availability % declines.

reply.author: NeFa Studio
reply.content: Changed data sync in v1.17; please see if this does any improvements.

title: Power pig. Nice calendar

author: Terry Davis
comment: Right ideas, bad execution. Fonts to small and way to many indicators. Then a Back and Menu button - way to crowded and busy. App does not appear to close when when returned to watch face which may be creating  the severe battery drain on my G Watch R. Not good, especially for paid app.
title: Needs Work

author: martin allen
comment: By far the best calendar for android wear. This is a genuinely full featured calendar app, with a well thought out interface. Couldn't ask for more, really.
title: Great!
